  <description>
    <facet>

      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:s01.klascement.net:19996</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>KC</catalog>
            <entry>19996</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="nl">Ice Cream Graphing</string>
          </title>
          <language>nl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Do you know how to make and use a graph? If not, you can start learning here. You need to have JavaScript enabled in your browser.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ICT-eindtermen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">graph</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">simple graph</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>4</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Können Sie ein Diagramm bilden und benutzen? Wenn nicht, 
können Sie hier, zu erlernen beginnen. Sie müssen das Javascript 
haben, das in Ihrer Datenbanksuchroutine aktiviert wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Savez-vous faire et utiliser un graphique ? Si pas, vous 
pouvez commencer à apprendre ici. Vous devez avoir le Javascript 
permis dans votre navigateur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Você sabe fazer e usar um gráfico? If.not, você pode 
começar aprender aqui. Você necessita ter o Javascript permitido em 
seu browser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sapete fare ed usare un grafico? Se non, potete cominciare 
imparare qui. Dovete avere Javascript permesso in vostro browser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ξέρετε πώς να κάνετε και να χρησιμοποιήσετε μια γραφική 
παράσταση; Αν όχι, μπορείτε να αρχίσετε εδώ. Πρέπει να 
επιτρέψετε JavaScript στον ξεφυλλιστή σας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Usted sabe hacer y utilizar un gráfico? Si no, usted puede 
comenzar a aprender aquí. Usted necesita tener Javascript permitido 
en su browser.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ICT-eindtermen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diagramm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">einfaches Diagramm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ICT-eindtermen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">graphique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">graphique simple</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ICT-eindtermen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gráfico simples</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
